Text: Monthly Report on SLA Activity Cc Attached please find the September report Exhibit No format showing current month activity in the System Levelized Account SLA Information for this report comes from data provided by Gas Accounting Dept Several items to note for this time period Monthly MIP decreased from for August to for September The cash portion of the SLA increased million and the future liability portion decreased million for a net decrease of million The two major components of the change in cash were Purchases of Bcf for million cash out Shippers longed Northern Bcf for million cash out This file contains reports for the months of January through September To print the desired months report simply click on the respective tab pmb

Monthly Report on SLA Activity Cc Attached please find the August report showing current month activity in the System Levelized Account SLA Information for this report comes from data provided by Gas Accounting Dept Several items to note for this time period nothing material Monthly MIP decreased from for June to for July Cash portion of the SLA decreased K and future liability portion decreased K for an overall decrease of K This file contains reports for the months of January through August To print the desired months report simply click on the respective tab Call me with any questions pmb

RE Offsystem Capacity Cc Michele Under the Accounting Procedures section the second bullet states Northern will account for any costs of third party transportation service through general ledger Account Transmission and Compression of Gas by Others I propose that NNG use Account Other Transmission Expense rather than Account for these third party transportation service costs The Code of Regs states for Acct This account shall include amounts paid to others for the transmission and compression of gas of the utility However it is specifically stated in the second paragraph of your Offsystem Capacity procedures Northern will not hold title to any natural gas stored or transported on a third party facility Thus the use of Account contradicts NNGs intent of not taking possession of the gas Also the use of Account for transportation service costs would be very consistent with the use of Account for storage service costs The Code of Regs description of the types of expenses to be included in each account is almost identical with the exception of the words storage and transmission system to wit Other expenses This account shall include the cost of labor material used and expenses incurred in operating underground storage plant and other underground storage operating expenses not includible in any of the foregoing accounts including research development and demonstration expenses Other expenses This account shall include the cost of labor material used and expenses incurred in operating transmission system equipment and other transmission system expenses not includible in any of the foregoing accounts including research development and demonstration expenses pmb Original Message From Winckowski Michele Sent Monday December PM To Miller Kent Miller Mary Kay Williams Jo Neville Sue Dornan Dari Blair Lynn Fancler Dan Chandler Bob Brennan Patrick Bodnar Michael Roobaert Preston Cabrera Reyna Buchanan John Brostad Karen Paladino Ranelle Cc Kirk Steve Subject Offsystem Capacity Attached are the revised Procedures for Offsystem Capacity I have incorporated the comments from several meetings and discussion with various individuals Please review and provide comments The final version of these procedures will be forwarded to NNGs executive management for approval Therefore please provide comments by COB Friday December th Thanks MW File offsystem procdoc File OFFSYSTEM CONTRACT APPROVAL levelsdoc
